Configuration

Source

Exchange Server

Give the credentials of the Exchange hostname or IP, and the Admin user.

Outlook Profile

This could be either an Exchange Admin profile, or a regular Exchange profile. If it's an Admin profile, you can choose users. A regular profile will just be migrated by itself.

PST File

Choose a PST file, and everything in that file will be migrated.

Destination

Hostname

Enter the Zimbra Hostname.

Admin Port

Enter the admin port.

Use Secure Connection

Yes for HTTPS, no for HTTP.

Admin ID

Enter the admin user.

Admin Password

Enter the admin password.

Domain

Enter the Zimbra domain.
